title: Good Morning, Tom
story: Good morning, Tom. It's time to get up. Is it 7:00 already? I'm still sleepy. That's okay, dear. Are you Hungry? Yes, mom. I am so hungry. Can I have pancakes? Of course, you can. I'll get them ready. Thanks, mom. I'm on my way! It's a beautiful morning, son. Yes, it's a sunny day.
summary: A young boy named Tom wakes up to his mother calling him and starts his day with a delicious breakfast of pancakes on a beautiful sunny morning.
image: A young boy waking up in bed with a smile on his face, sunlight streaming through the window.
